thread.title: You will soon be using a driverless car, but no one knows how - SFGate
thread.title_full: You will soon be using a driverless car, but no one knows how - SFGate - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: SFGate
title: You will soon be using a driverless car, but no one knows how - SFGate
text:
I spent a couple days last week at Code/Mobile, a conference for tech executives, and not a single person I saw, either on stage or in private conversation, doubted the rise of autonomous cars. Google's cute, mini Koala-like car is perhaps the most visible prototype of the future.
 SFGate.
